title: rito pls
body:
pls stop making the game just funny for the master and pro players... where its just a matchup of ``skill`` (whats good in this meta5on5). Now u baleced that game so mutch that its only fun every 8 game from a bronce to dia 2. its only fun if all 10 players have the same skill and know how to play the map.... Dont forget its just a game, and not all of us are willing to go pro.
or am i the only one???
